alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN SCOTTS BLUFF...NORTHEASTERN KIMBALL...BANNER...SOUTHEASTERN GOSHEN AND NORTHEASTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 400 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from near Hawk Springs to 7 miles east of Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area...and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and visibilities less than one half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Wildcat Hills Campground, Harrisburg and Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!
